title: Global Descend, It All Starts With The Sage Eyes - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Eye Powers   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Male Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Ink Bagpipe   墨风笛
description:
The end of the world is coming, and all the staff travel through the wasteland to start a small graveyard. Survival depends on fighting monsters and upgrading!

Others are real survivors, but Wang Lu starts with Tianhu!

Sage’s Eye!

Double reward!

Wheel of fortune!

When everyone else was worrying about survival, Wang Lu had already resisted the bazooka on his shoulder, holding Gatling in his hand, and leading a group of younger brothers to attack the zombie lord.>
